title: Where Do My PC Builds Go?!
description: What happens to PC builds after they're built?   I've linked a few desk mats similar to the one I personally use from Alphacool:   ModRight:  Bertech:   PATREON:  TWITCH:  FACEBOOK:  TWITTER:  INSTAGRAM:   Subscribe to the channel!  MUSIC: 'Final Destination' by Talamanca Provided by Silk Music   DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our CJ account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.
